e: ￹`o~ `mi~`padang~`ay~￺a helper * assistant in a task￻幫忙的人，某種任務上的助手或助理
￹`Ira~ `haw~ `ko~ `pa~`padang~`en~ `ako~?￺Is there anything I can do to help?￻有我需要幫忙的嗎？
￹`Mamaan~ `ma~`pa~`padang~ `kita~ `to~ `tayal~.￺How about us helping each other with the work?￻我們可否相互幫忙？
￹`Ma~`papada~`padang~ `kita~ `a~ `mi~`cokeroh~.￺Let's all help push.￻讓我們用心協力來推
